trends: There have been no other sightings in Kilauea
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: object moving across sky at high rate of speed,sudden stop,goes backwards,stops,then proceeds on original path
divs: Sighting Detailsvery clear,dark night,no clouds, looking up at the stars i noticed a light traveling at a very high rate of speed from northwest to southeast, when it suddenly stopped,sat there for about thirty seconds,then went backwards a few miles,stopped,stayed there about another thirty seconds,then took off like a bat out of hell on its original course southeast. then about a minute later there was another object similiar to the first one, but it was coming from the west,heading east,this one did not stop,just continued east very,very fast. these objects were not planes,they were going way too fast,and they were not satellites,because they were not in outer space, these were definitely in the atmosphere, guessing about 50-60 thousand feet up.. i live on the north shore of kauai- not much up here no light pollution, very good for looking at the sky-- we see weird stuff here all the time.. mahalo
